response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, but we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, considering its worth to you is significantly higher at $1,200,000. We understand the importance of making a deal that benefits both parties and hope this offer aligns with your expectations. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let us know. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
